name: The Azure Lux Game Jam Submission
name_original: The Azure Lux Game Jam Submission
description:
My casual (non-competitive) submission. I did not plan to participate in Azure Jam because I thought I would not have enough time (in fact I did not) but I was interested to play around with SDL2 and the emscripten and the theme was kind of interesting. But I did not use playfab, also the game is kind of terrible.

How to play:

  • W A S D - movements
  • Mouse Click - fire
  • Esc - restart the game
  • Avoid bullets and mobs
  • Mob's death from the player or other mob makes 3 white bullets and gives 0 points
  • Mob's death from the white bullet makes 3 green bullets and gives 1 point
  • Mob's death from the green bullet makes 3 blue bullets and gives 2 points
  • Mob's death from the blue bullet makes 3 purple bullets and gives 4 points
  • Mob's death from the purple bullet makes 3 gold bullets and gives 8 points
  • Mob's death from the gold bullet makes 3 gold bullets and may give 16, 32, 64... points

There is no leader board. Post the screenshot in the comments :D
